title: Check Property's Flood Zone Status
description: A buyer is interested in a property near a river and wants to know if it's in a flood zone, which would require flood insurance.

tasks.description: Enter the address into the FEMA Flood Map Service Center website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the FEMA portal to search for the property.

tasks.description: Interpret the map to determine the property's flood zone designation and inform the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the property is in 'Zone AE', a special flood hazard area, and informs the client that flood insurance will likely be required by their lender.
